Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly a throwback to the 80's Ninja craze era. Well, it is an enjoyable one and if you're a fan of 80's Ninja movies, it is probably one of biggest you can get.
